tool_description: Producteev is the leading social task management solution for teams. It’s helped thousands of teams get work done faster and more effectively. It's brought to you by Jive, the world's # 1 social business provider.
name: Producteev
title: Producteev

api_list.name: Get a Producteev file by its id
api_list.description: Files are usually attached to Notes. But because they remain an independant object type in the system, you need to upload the file first before being able to attach it to a note.

api_list.name: Return suggested colors for labels
api_list.description: Return the list of recommended colors (foreground and background) for the labels. You can create your labels with your own colors, but we strongly recommend to use colors returned by this API call to provide a consistent experience accross all Producteev apps.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-producteev.p.rapidapi.com/label_colors"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-producteev.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://community-producteev.p.rapidapi.com/label_colors"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-producteev.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get the list of pending invitation for the current user
api_list.description: Network Invitations are used to add people in existing networks. To invite someone you can either use the targetUser attribute if you know that this person is on Producteev and know his id. Otherwise use email and we'll send an invite to this person via email.

api_list.name: Return a list of suggestions for the natural language processing
api_list.description: The call will return a collection of NLP suggestion object.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: This method provide suggestions based on Keyword + Query. The keywords available are : # : for labels @ : for followers + : for assignees ! : for deadline * : for priority The query parameter must contains both the keyword and the text you wanna get suggestions for. e.g ?query=@Jerome

api_list.name: Get the Label with the specified id
api_list.description: Labels are attached to a task and are available across all your projects inside a network. This method returns a Label Object.
